text: Cool. There are a few issues I can see straight away on the side of the train. Next to each window there is an indent that shows where your topo flow is not quite working. When we review reels these types of things are what we are actually looking for. We are not actually that interested in the model its self, everyone can model, but not everyone takes the time to do it well. When we see any model our experience will instantly tell us what are the problem areas of that model, and we will actually be looking at those problem areas to see how you dealt with it. What separates the best from the even better is how you deal with issues like that.
Aha, that's already something I think I've managed to fix in the newer version. I'll send you some screengrabs later. Do you notice anything else straight away?
